full_summary:
# HVAC Maintenance Services for Canadian Embassy in Haiti
===============================================================================

## Tender Announcement Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4108650864
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-24
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-28T14:00:00 (This has been amended to 2023-09-26T14:00:00)
* **Contract Type**: Service Contract
* **Location**: Canadian Embassy in Port-au-Prince, Haiti

## Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a contractor to provide HVAC maintenance services at the Canadian Embassy in Haiti. The successful bidder will be required to provide all necessary tools, services, materials, travel, and labor to maintain the embassy's HVAC equipment in accordance with the Statement of Work. This requirement is subject to security clearance and a mandatory virtual meeting will be held on September 20, 2023 at 10:00am EST. Bidders must confirm their attendance by September 14th, 2023 at 14:00 EST.

## Selection Criteria

* **Price**: The contractor with the lowest price will be selected.

## Notice and Attachments

The tender notice and any attachments can be found on Ariba Discovery at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17259517?extsite=MTcyNTk1MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17259517?extsite=MTcyNTk1MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Stefan Ruest, Contracting Authority at [stefan.ruest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stefan.ruest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)  => There is no WTO GPA.

## Contract Period

The expected contract start date is September 1, 2023 and the expected contract end date is September 30, 2025.
